attributes.action: Reduce the court fee for care proceedings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We urge government to drastically reduce the court fee for care proceedings so as to remove any impediment for local authorities to issue care proceedings.
We believe that
* Local Authorities are driven by budgetary restrictions and targets.
* Child Welfare is paramount
* Decisions to remove children from abusive adults should be taken without the disincentive of money.
* The Court fee in any event is passing from one government department to another.
* The case of Baby P is an example of what may happen in the future if the law is not changed.
* Justice is starved of resources and is no longer an equal partner to Health and Education as previously was the case.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
